alert.note: Alert for Buffalo (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 9:04PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Buffalo County through 945 PM CDT... At 904 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Plum City, or 15 miles east of Red Wing, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wabasha around 930 PM CDT. Modena around 945 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Lock And Dam 4, Nelson, Maxville, The Big Swamp Area, Herold, Tell, Misha Mokwa, and Urne. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
